Questo felice quadretto subisce un drastico sussulto quando la donna scopre che suo fratello Ciro, un piccolo ladruncolo di bassa leva, ÃƒÂ¨ rimasto implicato in un processo di camorra............

Cristina is an energetic woman from Southern Italy, now living in a small town in the North where she has at last been able to make a life for herself and her picture-perfect family, including her husband Michele and their two over-achieving children. One morning, Cristina is called to police headquarters, where she is stunned to find that her brother Ciro, whom she has not seen in fifteen years, is implicated in the trial of several members of the Neapolitan mafia.......
